alert.note: Alert for San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 7:50PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern San Saba County through 845 PM CDT... At 749 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Algerita, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Saba, Algerita, Bend, Chappel, Sloan, Harkeyville and Us- 190 Near The San Saba-Lampasas County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
